item.title: I always get p hat
item.dc:creator: @iatchi1019 iatchi1019
item.description:
@iatchi1019 wrote:

ok ive tried everything but i cant fix it. i always get the p hat. can someone fix this please im begging.

if(itemUseID == 962) { int prize = Item.randomPartyHat(); int get = getprizes(); int UsedOn = (int)(misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 3, 1) / 1000); sendMessage("You crack the cracker..."); deleteItem(962, getItemSlot(962), 1); p2.sendMessage("Someone cracked a cracker on you."); if (misc.random(1) == Item.randomPHat()) { sendMessage("You get the prize!"); addItem(Item.randomPHat(), 1); p2.sendMessage("But you didn't get the prize."); PlayerHandler.players[UsedOn].CrackerForMe = true; } else { sendMessage("They get the prize."); addItem(Item.randomPHat(), 1); p2.sendMessage("You get the prize!"); } }

thats my code can someone fix it.

Read full topic
